Transition Tufnell Park is part of the Transition Network, facing up to climate change and building a stronger community in Tufnell Park

Thursdays at the Diner

Come down to the Community Diner at Whittington Park Community Centre for a cup of tea and a chat every Thursday 6-7pm.

The Farmer and the Horse

As part of their Spring Film Season, Transition Kentish Town are showing The Farmer and the Horse at Annie’s Bar.

It’s a fascinating immersion into the world of three young people trying to get into agriculture who have fallen in love with working with horses. A vision of how farming might be in a lower-energy world.

All film showings are in the downstairs room at Annie’s Bar, 180 Kentish Town Road, NW5 2AE.

These are relaxed occasions and they usually have a friendly discussion afterwards. A £2 donation is requested.
